select r1_0.user_id,r1_1.id,r1_1.name from user_roles r1_0 join roles r1_1 on r1_1.id=r1_0.role_id where r1_0.user_id=?

select u1_0.award_id,u1_1.id,u1_1.creation_date,u1_1.experience,u1_1.image,u1_1.level,u1_1.name,u1_1.password,u1_1.title,u1_1.username from user_awards u1_0 join users u1_1 on u1_1.id=u1_0.user_id where u1_0.award_id=?
